choices.C: Set IP Data-Plane Learning to No
choices.B: Set L2 Unknown Unicast to Flood

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
By setting L2 Unknown Unicast to "Flood", the ACI fabric will flood unknown unicast traffic within the bridge domain. This ensures that packets from Server1 destined for Server2 will be forwarded to all ports in the bridge domain, allowing Server2 to receive the traffic even if its location is not known to the fabric
